name: Lord of Eroded Primal Fire
title: "The Slain Dragon Molded" Lord of Eroded Primal Fire
desc: A monster of the void, known as both the Reaper of the Abyss and "Gosoythoth." It is able to corrupt memories contained within the Ley Lines, congealing them into tangible forces of catastrophic portent.

attributes.source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with the Lord of Eroded Primal Fire

skills.name: Eroded Flaming Feathers
skills.desc: Deal 3 ? and Discard the top 1 card from your deck.

skills.name: Severing Primal Fire
skills.desc: Deals 1 ?, and deals 1 Piercing DMG to all the opponent's off-field characters. Both sides Discard the top 3 cards from their decks and attach 1 stack of Resentment to themselves.

skills.name: Resentment
skills.desc: (Passive) For every 6 cards you Discard, attach 1 stack of Resentment to self.
